languages.text: Покидая системы некронов, звездное божество мстительно истребило каждую планету-гробницу древних ксеносов. В нем говорила старая, пронесенная сквозь тысячелетия ненависть К'тан, что были однажды преданы своими немертвыми слугами.

Leaving the Necron systems behind, the Star God vengefully obliterated every Tomb World of the ancient xenos race. The old hatred of the C'tan, betrayed by their deathless servants, whispered inside him.
languages.original_text: Покидая системы некронов, звездное божество мстительно истребило каждую планету-гробницу древних ксеносов. В нем говорила старая, пронесенная сквозь тысячелетия ненависть К'тан, что были однажды преданы своими немертвыми слугами.

traits.locale_text: Leaving Necron systems, the Star God vengefully eliminated every Tomb World of this ancient xenos race. A millennia old hatred of C'Tan, who were betrayed by their deathless servants, whispered inside of him.

Leaving Necron systems, the Star God vengefully eliminated every Tomb World of this ancient xenos race. A millennia old hatred of C'Tan, who were betrayed by their deathless servants, whispered inside of him.

Leaving the Necron systems behind, the Star God vengefully obliterated every tomb world of the ancient xenos race. The ancient hatred of the C'tan, betrayed by their deathless servants, whispered inside him.

Leaving the Necron systems behind, the Star God vengefully obliterated every tomb world of the ancient xenos race. The ancient hatred of the C'tan, betrayed by their deathless servants, whispered inside him.

Leaving the Necron systems behind, the Star God vengefully obliterated every Tomb World of the ancient xenos race. The old hatred of the C'tan, betrayed by their deathless servants, whispered inside him.

Leaving the Necron systems behind, the Star God vengefully obliterated every Tomb World of the ancient xenos race. The old hatred of the C'tan, betrayed by their deathless servants, whispered inside him.

languages.text: 星神离开了太空死灵的星系之后，报复性地毁灭了这种古老异形的每个墓穴世界。被不死仆人背叛的古老仇恨，在星神心中不断回响。
languages.original_text: Leaving the Necron systems behind, the Star God vengefully obliterated every Tomb World of the ancient xenos race. The old hatred of the C'tan, betrayed by their deathless servants, whispered inside him.

traits.locale_text: 太空死灵离开了太空死灵的星系之后，报复性地毁灭了这种古老异形的每个墓穴世界。被不死仆人背叛的古老仇恨，在星神心中不断回响。

languages.text: Der Sternengott ließ die Necron-Systeme hinter sich und löschte rachsüchtig jede Gruftwelt der uralten Xenos-Spezies aus. Der uralte Hass der C'tan, von ihren todlosen Dienern verraten, flüsterte in ihm.
languages.original_text: Leaving the Necron systems behind, the Star God vengefully obliterated every Tomb World of the ancient xenos race. The old hatred of the C'tan, betrayed by their deathless servants, whispered inside him.

traits.locale_text: Der Sternengott ließ die Necron-Systeme hinter sich und löschte rachsüchtig jede Gruftwelt der uralten Xenos-Spezies aus. Der uralte Hass der C'tan, von ihren todlosen Dienern verraten, flüsterte in ihm.

languages.text: Laissant derrière lui les systèmes nécrons, le Dieu Stellaire anéantit tous les mondes-nécropoles de l'ancienne race xénos en guise de vengeance. La haine millénaire des C'tans, trahis par leurs serviteurs immortels, s'était ancrée dans son esprit.
languages.original_text: Leaving the Necron systems behind, the Star God vengefully obliterated every Tomb World of the ancient xenos race. The old hatred of the C'tan, betrayed by their deathless servants, whispered inside him.

traits.locale_text: Laissant derrière lui les systèmes nécrons, le Dieu Stellaire anéantit tous les mondes-nécropoles de l'ancienne race xénos en guise de vengeance. La haine millénaire des C'tans, trahis par leurs serviteurs immortels, s'était ancrée dans son esprit.

languages.text: Tras abandonar los sistemas Necrones, el dios estelar destruyó con rencor cada uno de los mundos necrópolis de los xenos ancestrales. El odio milenario del C'tan, traicionado por sus sirvientes inmortales, susurraba en su mente.
languages.original_text: Leaving the Necron systems behind, the Star God vengefully obliterated every Tomb World of the ancient xenos race. The old hatred of the C'tan, betrayed by their deathless servants, whispered inside him.

traits.locale_text: Tras abandonar los sistemas Necrones, el dios estelar destruyó con rencor cada uno de los mundos necrópolis de los xenos ancestrales. El odio milenario del C'tan, traicionado por sus sirvientes inmortales, susurraba en su mente.

languages.text: ネクロン星系を後にして、星々の神は復讐のために古代異種族の墳墓惑星をすべて消滅させた。死のない下僕に裏切られたク＝タンへの旧き憎しみが、彼の中でささやいていた。
languages.original_text: Leaving the Necron systems behind, the Star God vengefully obliterated every Tomb World of the ancient xenos race. The old hatred of the C'tan, betrayed by their deathless servants, whispered inside him.

traits.locale_text: ネクロン星系を後にして、星々の神は復讐のために古代異種族の墳墓惑星をすべて消滅させた。死のない下僕に裏切られたク＝タンへの旧き憎しみが、彼の中でささやいていた。

languages.text: Nekron sistemlerini arkasında bırakan Yıldız Tanrı, kadim zeno ırkına ait tüm Kabir Dünyaları öfkeyle yok etti. Ölüm nedir bilmeyen hizmetkârlarının ihanetine uğramış C'tan'ın eski nefreti, içten içe kulağına fısıldıyordu.
languages.original_text: Leaving the Necron systems behind, the Star God vengefully obliterated every Tomb World of the ancient xenos race. The old hatred of the C'tan, betrayed by their deathless servants, whispered inside him.

traits.locale_text: Nekron sistemlerini arkasında bırakan Yıldız Tanrı, kadim zeno ırkına ait tüm Kabir Dünyaları öfkeyle yok etti. Ölüm nedir bilmeyen hizmetkârlarının ihanetine uğramış C'tan'ın eski nefreti içten içe ona fısıldıyordu.
